25.title: "Heartbreak Soup: The Interdependence of Theme and Form"
25.author: Charles Hatfield
notes: Summary: Discusses a volume of G. and J. Hernandez' Love and Rockets.

Annotation (by Gene Kannenberg): While Heartbreak Soup is its primary focus, the article makes excellent use of film terminology as a tool; Hatfield doesn't fall into the trap of transplanting the terminology whole-scale, but rather proposes and uses some aspects, explaining just how and why they are useful in a comics context.
Includes bibliographical references.
